title: The Empire’s Only Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Apathetic Protagonist   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Child Protagonist   Childcare   Depression   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Empires   European Ambience   Familial Love   Family   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Magic   Nobles   Past Trauma   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Sister Complex   Suicides   Sword And Magic   Transmigration
author: 움선
description:
I ended my life with my own hands with no place to lean on. I thought I’d finally get some relief, but then I woke up in a strange place? 

“You’re Rosiane. You are the pride of Esteria, my beloved daughter and the only princess of the empire.” 

In the series of the novel “The Prince”, she possessed Rosiane de Esteria, who died at the age of five.

But… the men in this house, why are they so affectionate towards me?

“Rosiane, good girl. Are you going to call me father?”

“….”

“Rosiane! I’m Eryte!”

“Rosiane, you haven’t forgotten your brother’s name, have you? It’s Bernique.”

“Sister, I’m Leav. Do you remember my name?”

I took the place of Rosiane, and the situation of being loved beyond my means only makes me feel guilty. Can a mere person like me accept such love?>
